Job Title: Colombia - Sitecore Developer

Location: Cañon City, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Sitecore Developer 

About Globant

Globant Create is a leading digital consultancy that specializes in creating exceptional digital experiences for our clients. With a focus on innovation, creativity, and cutting-edge technology, we empower businesses to thrive in the digital age. Our talented team of developers, designers, and UX experts collaborate to deliver top-notch solutions to our clients.

Position Overview

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Sitecore Developer to join our dynamic team at Globant Create. As a Senior Sitecore Developer, you will play a pivotal role in designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality Sitecore-based web applications and solutions for our clients, who are prominent Fortune 500 companies based in the United States.

In this role, you will work on larger .com projects, leveraging your extensive Sitecore expertise to create digital experiences that meet the unique needs and demands of our prestigious clients. You will be at the forefront of innovation, working on projects that have a significant impact on the digital landscape and help shape the online presence of these industry leaders.

Key Responsibilities

Design, develop, and maintain scalable and high-performing websites and applications using full and headless implementations of Sitecore 10.Work closely with the project team to understand requirements and translate them into Sitecore solutions.Lead the technical planning and requirements gathering phases including estimate, develop, test, manage projects, architect, and deliver.Implement Sitecore best practices and optimize application performance.Provide mentorship and guidance to junior developers and perform code reviews.Collaborate with other team members to integrate Sitecore with various systems and technologies.Ensure the security of the Sitecore ecosystem by implementing industry-standard security practices.Continuously update technical knowledge and skills by attending in-house and external courses, reading manuals, and accessing new applications.


Qualifications

Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.Proven experience as a Sitecore Developer, with at least 6 years of hands-on experience.Strong Experience with Sitecore Experience Accelerator (SXA)Strong proficiency in Sitecore CMS, including Sitecore XP.Experience with Sitecore JSS is a plus.Proficiency in C# and ASP.NET MVC.Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and jQuery.Knowledge of UX/UI design principles and best practices is a plus.Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and continuous integration/delivery (CI/CD) pipelines.Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.Strong communication and teamwork skills.Sitecore certification(s) is a plus.


We are ready!

Job Segment:  Developer, .NET, Computer Science, Front End, User Experience, Technology

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
